history.proof: intros x y H1 H2. unfold Z.mul in H2. sauto q: on depth: 3use: Zlt_sign_pos_pos, Z, lt_irrefl.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Z H1 : 0 < x H2 : 0 < match x with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end Unable to unify "~ 0 < 0" with "0 < y".

In environment x, y : Z H1 : 0 < x H2 : 0 < match x with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end Unable to unify "(0 ?= ?M1410 * ?M1411) = Lt" with "(0 ?= y) = Lt".

original: intros x y H1 H2. unfold Z.mul in H2. apply Z.lt_irrefl with (x:= 0). apply Zlt_sign_pos_pos. - auto. - auto.
